title: Tillis Statement on FDA Approval of Pfizer Vaccine
description: U.S. Senator Thom Tillis (R-NC) issued the following statement on the Pfizer vaccine receiving full Federal Drug Administration (FDA) approval.
sitename: Thom Tillis, U.S. Senator for North Carolina
cleaned_text: CHARLOTTE, N.C. - Today, U.S. Senator Thom Tillis (R-NC) issued the following statement on the Pfizer vaccine receiving full Federal Drug Administration (FDA) approval: "The Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine has been given full FDA approval, which many Americans were waiting for.
